renders.title: Pacific Rim Scene Concept
renders.caption: Scene Setup
renders.description: I love Pacific Rim jaegers and after a long time of work I finally created something that's good, real good I think. The final render was done in Cycles with some post-processing in Photoshop to enhance the lighting and add some effects. It is not what I had in mind originally but I'm happy with the result. It kind of looks like a photo taken by a civilian during a jaeger battle.

renders.title: Shadow Wraith Character Concept
renders.caption: Character Design
renders.description: A character concept for an assassin in the shadows. Inspired from the abilities of the shadow knight and the dark knight, Shadow Wraith is mysterious figure, a Gun for Hire. No one knows where he is or who he is.

renders.title: Parallely Broken Singularity
renders.caption: Storyboarding
renders.description: A series of storyboards for a sci-fi short film concept. The story revolves around a mechanic who tries fixing a particle accelerator but get teleported to a broken universe. As he tries to escape, he encounters strange phenomena and must navigate through the altered environment to find a way back home. These are stills from a personal project I did back in 2023. It was inspired by the Dead Space game storyline.

renders.title: Low Poly Airport
renders.caption: Environment Design
renders.description: This is a low poly airport scene created using Blender. I was trying to capture the essence of Singapore Changi Airport with a low poly aesthetic.

videos.title: Rust Bucket Spaceship V3
videos.caption: Concept Animation
videos.description: Rust Bucket from Ben 10 series concept re-imagined as a sci-fi next gen aircraft.

videos.title: Swampfire Animation
videos.caption: Character Showcase
videos.description: Swampfire from Ben 10 series re-imagined as a realistic humanoid plant creature.

motion_graphics.title: Tech Corp Identity
motion_graphics.caption: Logo Reveal
motion_graphics.description: Final animation and styleframes presented to the client.

character_art.title: Orc Warrior
character_art.caption: Game Character
character_art.description: Final render, turntable, and topology check.

assets.title: Endless Runner Game Creator Template with Motion Matching
assets.previewTitle:
Endless Runner Game Creator
Template with Motion Matching
assets.caption: Game Template
assets.description: This template has got you covered with everything you need for making an endless runner game. This template includes a fully functional endless runner game with motion matching, customizable character, obstacles, power-ups, and more. You can easily modify the game mechanics and visuals to fit your game's theme and style. Whether you're a beginner or an experienced developer, this template provides a solid foundation for your endless runner game development. Get started today!

assets.title: Game Systems Collection for Unreal Engine 5
assets.caption: Game System
assets.description: This collection of game systems for Unreal Engine 5 is designed to help you get started quickly with your game development. It includes a free version of Infinite Runner Game Creator template along with additional systems such as Character Selection System, Character Customization System and Widgets Management System. These systems are modular and can be easily integrated into your existing projects. Whether you're a beginner or an experienced developer, this collection provides a solid foundation for your game development needs.

reviews.name: Mandy Bhute
reviews.text: During his internship as a 3D Blender Artist, he performed well, and his dedication to his responsibilities was commendable. As part of his internship, he also demonstrated a strong work ethic and high productivity. We wish him the best in his future career and thank him for his contributions.
